casebody.data:
No. 838,

Mise.

Eubanks v. Louisiana. Leopold Stahl for petitioner.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Louisiana. It is ordered that execution of the sentence of death imposed upon the petitioner be, and the same is hereby, stayed pending final disposition of the petition for writ of certiorari. In the event certiorari is granted, this stay is to continue until final disposition of the case.
